reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's soft, fuzzy material and find it perfect for cool days, with one noting it's warm without being bulky.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cozy, cheery and soft!
items.body: I agree it’s like wearing a cozy hug, plus the mustard color is so cheery! I’d say the fit is true to size, rather than oversized. I’m 5’3 and 125lbs for reference. Picture shows length and fit on my frame. Weight is light while still being warm. It’s soft on both sides, inside and out, open front-no buttons. So far seems good quality. Will update on washability. Read more
items.author: ShopperMom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful sweaters: soft, light & warm
items.body: Machine washable polyester knit: very light and soft but Amazingly warm against chilly winds or dampness. When on sale, I had bought several: they come in many colors and are easy to care for. Have given a few as gifts. I am a size medium but always buy EXTRA LARGE for extra room to wear over outer clothes...or to wear for sleeping comfort. A Cozy addition to wardrobe. Read more
items.author: rmp

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: Sizing and fit accurate. Soft and cozy a little looser knit that I thought but still cute and cozy Read more
items.author: Tanya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite cardigan!
items.body: Loooove this sweater! It’s made well and the color is stunning! It’s definitely oversized! I’m 5’5 and weight 150 and I got a medium! I could have gone with a small! It’s so soft and cozy and I get compliments every time I wear it! It’s such a beautiful color for fall! Read more
items.author: ShariBabeeee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweaters in amazing colors
items.body: Bought 4 of these now in different colors. They wash really well, aren't too heavy but perfectly warm for the PNW for most of the year and at night in the summertime. Easily go over a nice dress or jeans and hang really nice. The first 2 colors we've had in the house for over 2 years and my elderly mom and I both wear them so they get lots of use. They are super easy to grab. She loves the large pockets that hold everything. I love that they are long and go down over the rear. Super soft too. Last 2 we got were and off white/beige and a mocha colored one that's darker. The first two were olive green and dark teal. All super nice colors and highly recommended. Read more
items.author: COFFEE LOVER

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and so very warm! Beautiful sweater
items.body: I wanted a soft bulky type sweater and when I found this one, I was hopeful and I was NOT disappointed. This sweater is so cute, so very soft and very warm. It's like cuddling up in your favorite blanket. The pictures don't do it any justice. It's a beautiful sweater. I purchased a M and it fits perfectly over another shirt as well as alone. It is machine or hand washable and it washes beautifully. I wash mine in a delicates bag. The tag doesn't say it is machine dryable, but I dried it about 20 minutes on low to get some of the water weight out of it and then hung it up to complete drying. The quality is excellent, made very well. I purchased the red one and it is a beautiful red, a much prettier red than shown in the picture. I also purchased the Mocha color and I ordered it in L. I wanted the feel of being the oversized boyfriend sweater and it works perfectly. A note: the sweaters come vacuum-packed. Once you cut the bag, the sweater fluffs up. Hang on a dress hanger and any wrinkles will just fall out. Highly recommend this sweater! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!! I will be purchasing more colors. Well worth the $$. Update: White is on order. I have since purchased the LtPeri (Periwinkle color). It's a beautiful light lavender. Read more
items.author: nanktsc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy, shrinks in wash, size up
items.body: Super soft and cozy. When I first got it, it seemed a big, but I was OK with that because this style pd sweater should be a little big. After one wash (in cold water) it shrunk considerably and now is true to size or even a bit small. I still love it, but would buy a size up next time. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sweater Is Just "Okay"
items.body: This sweater is "okay". It is very soft and comfy. Yarn is pretty chunky and the weave is loose. If you hold it up to a light, you can see light through the knitting, so it's definitely something you would not wear on a cold day. Looks more like something you'd wear over sleeveless pajamas while lounging around the house. But the green/ light basil color is nice for fall and the size small is a nice fit for me, so I'm keeping it as a "throw-on" for very casual days. Read more
items.author: Jackie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, Wine, Maroon, Bat Off White, Bat Grey, Black, Mocha, Dusty Blue, Bat Black, Orange, Taro, Olive, Red, A-tea Rose. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
